title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry bacon in a pan until crispy, then add minced garlic and cook briefly.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese together.
Drain pasta and add it to the pan with bacon (remove from heat).
Quickly stir in the egg mixture until creamy.
Season with salt and black pepper, then serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic in oil until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for another 10 minutes, season with salt, and serve.

title: Jollof Rice
summary: A West African one-pot rice dish cooked in a rich tomato and pepper sauce with spices.
instructions: Blend tomatoes, bell pepper, and half the onion until smooth.
Heat oil in a pot and sauté remaining chopped onion.
Add tomato paste and fry for 2 minutes.
Pour in blended mixture and cook until reduced.
Add stock, thyme, curry powder, and salt.
Stir in washed rice, cover, and cook on low heat until tender.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy golden pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Heat a lightly greased pan over medium heat.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Cook until golden brown and serve.
